message: Going to be moving to Spain from Ireland (hopefully) indefinitely this week. I freelance and can carry my jobs over with me, but I would be hopefully looking to get involved once I get over there, so I'm wondering are there any Spaniards here? (I'm going to Valencia)
I spend 2-3 months/year in Barcelona myself.
I'm spanish, and I live in Albacete, a couple of hours from Valencia. If you need any information about the country, tell me.
Hopefully here to stay in Valencia for a while. Thanks for the replies. Are there any Spanish-specific django groups/resources here?
you mean here in Spain or here in Valencia?

well as far as I know there is django.es but there are not any Django groups in Spain. To the North there is at least one university that teaches Django and has some Django talks every year, I think it's Deusto. In Madrid there is no group yet.

Hi! I'm from Spain but currently I'm living in London. The group that maraujop has talk about is http://www.djangobilbao.com/  We've only made I meeting (6 months ago) :( But there was to many people interested in Django we was like.. 12?
hmm.. tried to delete/edit my post, but no luck. ~ I'm working in Madrid. I know that myself and a couple others would be interested in a meetup.
